Summer is usually the only time of the year when I have a significant amount of free time. A 40 hour work week feels like nothing compared to the constant onslaught of assignments, projects, and tests that entail the school year. So, one of the things I've set out to do with all this extra time is watch more films. There isn't any specific theme or genre I'm trying to explore, but rather I just want to expose myself to more film.

Films May 9th - May 16th

  • May 09 - The Darjeeling Limited, Wes Anderson (2007)

  • May 11 - Somewhere, Sofia Coppola (2010)

  • May 12 - Bridesmaids, Paul Feig (2011)

  • May 13 - Starsky & Hutch, Todd Phillips (2004)

  • May 14 - Hot Fuzz, Edgar Wright (2007)

  • May 15 - Pitch Perfect, Jason Moore (2012)

  • May 16 - Mad Max: Fury Road, George Miller (2015)

  • May 16 - Shanghai Noon, Tom Dey (2000)
